${modID}:Advance.NAME: Cash Advance
${modID}:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

${modID}:AllIn.NAME: All In
${modID}:AllIn.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Chip X: Enemey loses X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:AllIn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Chip X: Enemy loses X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RiskyInvestment.NAME: Risky Investment
${modID}:RiskyInvestment.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CursedDie.NAME: Cursed Die
${modID}:CursedDie.DESCRIPTION: 1/6 chance to permanently remove a *Cursed *Die from your deck when played. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SunkCost.NAME: Sunk Cost
${modID}:SunkCost.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Permanently increase this card's Block or damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SnakeEyes.NAME: Snake Eyes
${modID}:SnakeEyes.DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:SnakeEyes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Die Rolls are 1 for 2 turns. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.

${modID}:RedKing.NAME: Red King
${modID}:RedKing.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Red_Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Dice.

${modID}:DoubleDealing.NAME: Double-Dealing
${modID}:DoubleDealing.DESCRIPTION: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FatesHand.NAME: Fate's Hand
${modID}:FatesHand.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:TrickstersMark.NAME: Trickster's Mark
${modID}:TrickstersMark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${modID}:LuckyBreak.NAME: Lucky Break
${modID}:LuckyBreak.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gain !M! Dexterity.

${modID}:DoubleDown.NAME: Double Down
${modID}:DoubleDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you end your turn with !B! or less Block, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ChaosFour.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFour.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosFive.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosFive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact and 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosSix.NAME: Chaos Die
${modID}:ChaosSix.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! cards this turn are played twice. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChaosForm.NAME: Chaos Form
${modID}:ChaosForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

${modID}:Fold.NAME: Fold
${modID}:Fold.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn.

${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.NAME: Luck of the Draw
${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:LuckOfTheDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Whenever you draw a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:CardShark.NAME: Card Shark
${modID}:CardShark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0.

${modID}:Bluff.NAME: Bluff
${modID}:Bluff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have !M! debuffs, gain !B! Block.
${modID}:Bluff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have !M! debuff or less, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:FoolsFortune.NAME: Fool's Fortune
${modID}:FoolsFortune.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with no Attacks in hand, gain !M! Block and [E] next turn.

${modID}:DeadlyWager.NAME: Deadly Wager
${modID}:DeadlyWager.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP
${modID}:DeadlyWager.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength NL (bypasses Artifact). NL At the start of your turn, lose 2 HP

${modID}:StrategistsShield.NAME: Strategist's Shield
${modID}:StrategistsShield.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Strength for each Power in hand.
${modID}:StrategistsShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Strength for each non-Attack, non-Skill in hand.

${modID}:Rig.NAME: Rig
${modID}:Rig.DESCRIPTION: Cards in your draw and discard pile cost 0 until played this turn. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Jackpot.NAME: Jackpot
${modID}:Jackpot.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If this is the only card in your hand, draw !M! cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.NAME: Heart Of The Cards
${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:HeartOfTheCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X+1 cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StackedDeck.NAME: Stacked Deck
${modID}:StackedDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, set the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.
${modID}:StackedDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, set the cost of a random card in your draw pile to 0 until played.

${modID}:HitAndRun.NAME: Hit and Run
${modID}:HitAndRun.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Your Attacks deal 75% more damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.
${modID}:HitAndRun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal 75% more damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.

${modID}:MaxedOut.NAME: Maxed Out
${modID}:MaxedOut.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CoinBarrage.NAME: Coin Barrage
${modID}:CoinBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 11 times. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

${modID}:PokerFace.NAME: Poker Face
${modID}:PokerFace.DESCRIPTION: In 2 turns, set your health to its current value. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PokerFace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In 2 turns, set your health to its current value.

${modID}:LongGame.NAME: Long Game
${modID}:LongGame.DESCRIPTION: Doesn't shuffle into your deck at the start of combat. Added into hand on turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HighRoller.NAME: High Roller
${modID}:HighRoller.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a *Six, draw a card.

${modID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${modID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card type in your hand.

${modID}:JokerTrick.NAME: Joker Trick
${modID}:JokerTrick.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs !M! less this turn. NL Exhaust
${modID}:JokerTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs !M! this turn. NL Exhaust

${modID}:AttackFromDeck.NAME: Attack
${modID}:AttackFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:SkillFromDeck.NAME: Skill
${modID}:SkillFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Skill from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:PowerFromDeck.NAME: Power
${modID}:PowerFromDeck.DESCRIPTION: Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:CheatersLuck.NAME: Cheater's Luck
${modID}:CheatersLuck.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random card in your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:CheatersLuck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate a random cards in your hand twice. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HighCard.NAME: High Card
${modID}:HighCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL The next time this card is played, deal !D! damage.

${modID}:GreenOne.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenOne.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenTwo.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenTwo.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenThree.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenThree.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenFour.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenFour.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenFive.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenFive.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GreenSix.NAME: Green Die
${modID}:GreenSix.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PrismaticRoll.NAME: Prismatic Roll
${modID}:PrismaticRoll.DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:PrismaticRoll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die.

${modID}:SlyShot.NAME: Sly Shot
${modID}:SlyShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the highest health enemy !M! times.

${modID}:PocketPair.NAME: Pocket Pair
${modID}:PocketPair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Green_Dice. NL Give them Retain. NL Exhaust

${modID}:Underdog.NAME: Underdog
${modID}:Underdog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL  If your HP is lower than the enemy's, this deals triple damage.

${modID}:InvigoratingRiffle.NAME: Invigorating Riffle
${modID}:InvigoratingRiffle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Skill is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.

${modID}:AceInTheHole.NAME: Ace In The Hole
${modID}:AceInTheHole.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Purge.
${modID}:AceInTheHole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Put a card from your draw or exhaust pile into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Purge.

${modID}:CycleStrike.NAME: Cycle Strike
${modID}:CycleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. Draw X cards. Discard X cards. Gain [E].

${modID}:WaveOfGreed.NAME: Wave of Greed
${modID}:WaveOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! gold for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DrunkenStrike.NAME: Drunken Strike
${modID}:DrunkenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you draw this, randomize its cost.

${modID}:LuckySeven.NAME: Lucky Seven
${modID}:LuckySeven.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 7th card you've played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:LuckyEight.NAME: Lucky Eight
${modID}:LuckyEight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is the 8th card you've played this turn, gain 8 Thorns.

${modID}:LuckyNine.NAME: Lucky Nine
${modID}:LuckyNine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. If this is the 9th card you've played this turn, gain 9 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrokenBottle.NAME: Broken Bottle
${modID}:BrokenBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add !M! *Glass *Shard into your hand.
${modID}:BrokenBottle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add !M! *Glass *Shards into your hand.

${modID}:UnleashedStrategy.NAME: Unleashed Strategy
${modID}:UnleashedStrategy.DESCRIPTION: Increase your max hand size by !M!. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E] for every 3 cards in hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:GameChanger.NAME: Game Changer
${modID}:GameChanger.DESCRIPTION: Each enemy takes damage equal to its intent to attack. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:GameChanger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each enemy takes damage equal to its intent to attack.

${modID}:SharksEmbrace.NAME: Shark's Embrace
${modID}:SharksEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, discard the leftmost card in your hand, then draw a card.

${modID}:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
${modID}:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Chip !M!: This turn, your next card is played twice.

${modID}:BagOfChips.NAME: Bag of Chips
${modID}:BagOfChips.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards then add that many random ${modID}:Poker_Chips into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Stash.NAME: Stash
${modID}:Stash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a ${modID}:randomized ${modID}:Poker_Chip into your hand.

${modID}:Outrage.NAME: Outrage
${modID}:Outrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${modID}:Chip 1: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemeis.

${modID}:BigHands.NAME: Big Hands
${modID}:BigHands.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that cost less than 2.

${modID}:GlassShard.NAME: Glass Shard
${modID}:GlassShard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ChippedBlade.NAME: Chipped Blade
${modID}:ChippedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! ${modID}:Crippling_Debt. NL Add a ${modID}:randomized ${modID}:Poker_Chip into your hand.

${modID}:BuyIn.NAME: Buy In
${modID}:BuyIn.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Green *Chips into your hand. NL Gain [E] for each ${modID}:Poker_Chip in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DiceShaker.NAME: Dice Shaker
${modID}:DiceShaker.DESCRIPTION: Roll 1 ${modID}:Red_Die. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

${modID}:Grapes.NAME: Grapes
${modID}:Grapes.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Increase a card's Block and damage by !M! this combat. Add a copy of this card into your hand that costs 1 more. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Melon.NAME: Melon
${modID}:Melon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Drawback to EVERYONE.

${modID}:CoinFlick.NAME: Coin Flick
${modID}:CoinFlick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! ${modID}:Drawback. Shuffle a copy of this card into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cherry.NAME: Cherry
${modID}:Cherry.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times your cards in hand.

${modID}:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
${modID}:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: You cannot draw additional cards this turn. Whenever you attack this turn, gain [E].

${modID}:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
${modID}:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Roll !M! ${modID}:Purple_Die. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

${modID}:ChipShuffle.NAME: Chip Shuffle
${modID}:ChipShuffle.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all ${modID}:Poker_Chips in your hand into your draw pile. Draw a card for each one shuffled.
${modID}:ChipShuffle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all ${modID}:Poker_Chips in your hand into your draw pile. Draw a card and gain !B! block for each one shuffled.

${modID}:FinalBet.NAME: Final Bet
${modID}:FinalBet.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all ${modID}:Poker_Chips in your hand. Deal !D! damage for each one exhausted. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CardCascade.NAME: Card Cascade
${modID}:CardCascade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw a card.

${modID}:CardCount.NAME: Card Count
${modID}:CardCount.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have 10 or more cards in hand, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:CrackedChip.NAME: Cracked Chip
${modID}:CrackedChip.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL ${modID}:Poker_Chip. NL When this is spent, Exhaust it.

${modID}:GrayChip.NAME: Gray Chip
${modID}:GrayChip.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Poker_Chip. Unplayable. NL When this is spent, gain [E] . NL Ethereal.

${modID}:OrangeChip.NAME: Orange Chip
${modID}:OrangeChip.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Poker_Chip. NL Increase your max hand size by 1. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BlackChip.NAME: Black Chip
${modID}:BlackChip.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Poker_Chip. NL Unplayable. NL Counts as !M! ${modID}:Poker_Chips. Always spent first.

${modID}:GoForBroke.NAME: Go For Broke
${modID}:GoForBroke.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, apply 1 ${modID}:Crippling_Debt to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Reevaluate.NAME: Reevaluate
${modID}:Reevaluate.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Reevaluate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage.
